51125.summary: Some customers in the Surroundings of Knowles avenue area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
